result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Calvin Davonte Marlow

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Calvin Davonte Marlow in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Defendant Calvin Davonte Marlow in custody.  Jeremy R. Arn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Pursuant to plea negotations, and on motion of the State, Court ordered case DISMISSED to be used as a read-in on 15CF1021.

Defendant Calvin Davonte Marlow in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Jeremy R. Arn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court involved in a Jury Trial.  Matter rescheduled for plea and sentencing.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 13, 2015 at 08:30 am.

BRANCH 26 FOR BRANCH 21.  Defendant Calvin D Marlow in court with attorney Jamie Francis Cimpl-Wiemer for Vincent Guimont.  James C. Griffin  for Jeremy Arn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    ENTRY MADE WITHOUT THE COURT FILE.  Present in court is Justice Point Case Worker Jacob Haller.  Case in court due to violation.  Arguments heard as to bail.  Court admonishes Defendant.  Court ordered the defendant be monitored in INTENSIVE SUPERVISON with Justice Point.  Defendant ordered to work with Justice Point resources immediately on a treatment plan.   Case remains calendared for Plea and sentencing on July 15, 2015 at 8:30 am in Branch 21.
Defendant Calvin Davonte Marlow in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Jeremy R. Arn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 15, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Calvin D Marlow in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Jeremy R. Arn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for scheduling conference. Scheduling conference held off the record. Defense requested plea and sentencing date.  Case remains calendared in Branch 21.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Calvin Davonte Marlow in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.   Jeremy Arn for Patrick Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

*CASE HEARD WITHOUT CIRCUIT COURT FILE*
Status conference held.  Parties engaged in negotiations; attempting global resolution with 15CM001014. Status date selected.  Status conference scheduled for May 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Calvin Davonte Marlow in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Patrick J Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin telephonically.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter before the Court for scheduling conference.  Co-defendant cases transferred back to Branch 22 as the cases (15CF1374 and 15CF1375) will not be tried together.  The state considering dismissal and reissue of a different charge.  Status date selected with the parties.

  Status conference scheduled for May 5, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Vincent Paul Guimont in court, defendant Calvin Davonte Marlow not in court, in custody.  Ron Dague for Patrick J Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    
Case is reassigned to Branch 21, Judge Brash due to lower pending case.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 28, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with co-actors Devin D. Wright (dob 3-16-97) and Martavis W. Pugh (dob 1-16-96).

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  DEFENDANT to be monitored by drug testing.  

No Contact with co-actors Devin D. Wright (dob 3-16-97) and Martavis W. Pugh (dob 1-16-96).

Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Calvin Davonte Marlow in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Calvin Davonte Marlow in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Witkowiak, Branch 22.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Status conference scheduled for April 7, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
